title: Permanent Ban
body: My account has been permanently ban by riot without giving me explanation whatsoever. Does anyone know how i could contact riot. They haven't been responding to my tickets and its really annoying the shit out of me that they would do that to my account towards the end of season. I have spent countless hours and money on the game and it just hurt a lot that riot would do this.

replies.body:
This account is not banned but protectively suspended due to compromise(hackers) while we attempt to recover it to its original creator. 

I pulled up your tickets and those agents have been responding back and forth with you as well. Sending extra info like a drivers license wouldn't help verify you in any way since we don't use that info on signup. Look over the questions the agents have provided and do your best to answer the ones you can.

Broporo i check my mails and i havent recieve any questions from you
all i see is you seding the permaban email
I haven't sent any emails personally, you'll need to respond to the agents in your ticket to get that taken care of like I mentioned previously!
I havent receive anything from them either
@broporo have you been sending them to my mail??
NO not at all and never will. All i been doing is playing rank and normal games
